content.rendered:
Directed by Milap Zaveri

Written by Milap Zaveri

Star John Abraham (Dadasaheb Balram Azad / HM Satya D. Balram Azad / ACP Jay D. Balram Azad). Divya Khosla Kumar (Vidya Maurya Azad). Harsh Chhaya (Chandra Prakash Maurya). Gautami Kapoor (Suhasini D. Balram Azad). Shaad Randhawa (Sardara Singh). Anup Soni (DCP Rajmohan Upadhyay). Akash Anand (Chandraprakash’s aide). Agast Annand (Aslam Shaikh (Ibad’s father)). Akash Beri (Bailif). Raj Bhaavsar (Doc Colleague 2). Debanjan Chatterjee (Mahendra). Chandan Das (Beggar Boy 2). Pinakin Dave (Temple Priest). Mohammed Faisal (Randhir (as Mohhammad Faisal)). Som Ganguly (Reporter 2). Mayank Garg (Male Anchor flashback). Rajul Gaur (Shankar’s security). Himanshu Gokani (Dean Agnihotri). Brijesh Kumar Gupta (Vinayak (as Brijesh Gupta)). Rajendra Gupta (Daya Kaka). Zakhir Hussain (Minister Shankar Prasad (as Zakir Hussain)). Iamrealmohsin (Mohsin).Md Ariful Islam . Akshat Jain (Virag). Amlesh Jaiswal (Paanwala). Deep Joshi (Self). Arnav Atul Kalkundri (Abdul (handicapped beggar boy)). Khusboo Kamal (Mother a Kabristaan). Sejal Kamwani (Sheetal (Hospital Victim)). Garima Kapoor (Reporter 1). Jyoti Kapoor (Fatima Ali). Hafeez Khan (Anjuman Father 1). Zia Ahmed Khan (Dr. Ansari). Zohab Khan (Anjuman Father 3). Haresh Khatri (Security Guard’s doctor). Shagun Khurana (News Anchor Neha Bhasin). Rehan Kidwai (Bride’s father). Survi Kohli (Fatima’s daughter). Viva Kothari (Little Vidya).Pulkit Kumar . Suraj Kumar (Police officer 2).Bhagyashree Limaye . Rahul Mahajan (Vikram Awasthi). Siya Mahajan (Female Anchor flashback). Poonam Mahida (Temple Devotee).Bikram Malati . Aryan Mandale (Beggar Boy 3). Aprajita Mehra (Mrs. Malhotra). Manisha Mehra (Young Doctor Volunteer). Arpit Mishra (ACP Shukla). Chakramani Mishra (Government Rep.). Bharat Pahuja (Rajendra Kapadia). Shashank Pal (Ibad). Neetu Pandey (Sheetal’s mother (as Neetu Pande)). Akshay Pandey (Police officer 1). Dayashankar Pandey (Minister Tripathi (as Daya Shankar Pandey)). Saurabh Pandey (Santosh (beggar boy)). Rajeev Pillai (Goon 1). Ashutosh Pradhan (Assembly Speaker). Prakash (Dilawar (beggar kids’ owner)). Rj Rahul (Emcee). Devaksh Rai (Doc Colleague 1). Ambuj Rastogi (Inspector Ramesh Rastogi). Varun Rastogi (Shripath Reporter). Saif (Anjuman Father 4). Sameer (Miscreant 1). Nikita Sareen (Reporter 4). Shresthdeep Saxena (Little Jay). Shubh Saxena (Little Satya)

Language Hindi

Producers Kunal Advani. Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Vinod Bhanushali. Madhu Bhojwani. Shiv Chanana. Arun Singh Dikky. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Neeraj Kalyan. Vishwambhar Kokitkar. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Priyanka Mehrotra. Satish Poddar. Meenakshi Sharma. Rameshchandra Yadav

Production Emmay Entertainment. T-Series Films
